summary: A mini-compilation featuring Athis, Belrand, Erandur, Erik the Slayer Faendal, and Marcurio overhauls.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG=RIGHT] http://i28.photobucket.com/albums/c249/AMUNET_CAMMEO/brelynapromote.jpg[/IMG]
[center][color=orange][size=4]1)[/size][/color]  [size=4]READ MY MODS USED LIST.[/size] None are required but different mods=different appearances for better OR FOR WORSE.

[size=4][color=orange]2)[/size][/color] [size=4] BELRAND, MARCURIO AND ATHIS’ weights are not fixed.[/SIZE] Why? Because their vanilla weights were way too skinny IMO.  Its really easy to fix this though, so [size=4]PLEASE READ KNOWN ISSUES SECTION.[/SIZE][/center]






[size=7]About[/size]
 My mini-compilation featuring some male followers. Vilkas, Stenvar and Onmund couldn’t make it because they weren’t ready/looked too similar to other people’s interpretations.
 If you want to use another modder’s facemorph for one of my characters, just place its .esp BELOW mine to override it. =)
And credits go to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1771111]gnatozuj[/url] for making male companions and 83willow for her genius application on Jenassa’s warpaint.


[size=7] Installation[/size]
Use NMM or manually drop the folder in the Skyrim root folder.
[size=7]Uninstallation[/size]
Use NMM or delete all of the files manually. If manually, remove the .TARGA, .dds, and the .NIF files with the codes all found in the [size=3] READ MES [/size] located at
skyrim/Data/textures/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceTint/Skyrim.esm and
skyrim/Data/meshes/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom/Skyrim.esm



[size=7] Mods Used[/size] (none required)
[list]
 [*][size=2][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4141] Geonox Face Maps[/url] and/or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1971] Smooth Faces for Gents[/url][/size]. I use Geonox for human males and Faendal, but manually installed the Smooth Faces Dark Elf texture ONLY.
[*] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3574] Gizmodian Scars [/url] makes scars a lot more thinner and clean
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869] Covereyes look 4[/url] (for the eyelashes)
[*][url= http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9249]Improved Eyes Skyrim[/url] (for the actual eye texture) 
 [*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488]Favored Soul’s Beautiful Males [/url](though bodytype doesn\'t matter)
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4333] Navetsea’s Straighter Hair Retexture[/url] (this hair retexture is too shiny for male hairs I find though, so not really recommended)
[/list]
For the screenshots I used [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23029]Goddess ENB[/url] by anaphiel and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20570] Vibrant ENB[/url] by KyokushinOyama.

[size=6] KNOWN ISSUES[/size]
[b] FIXING THE NECK SEAM [/b]
1- open up the console with the tilde key and then click on Marcurio/Athis/Belrand. In the console you should get a set of numbers and letters which is his basegame ID.
2- type in \"setnpcweight XX\" without the quotes and where XX is the value of the weight. 
3-  Marcurio’s weight is [size=2]50[/size], Athis’ and Belrand’s are both [size=2]30[/size]
4- Hit enter, and exit the console. Weight should be fixed and warpaint will disappear (only temporary) 
5- SAVE YOUR GAME and restart.  From then on the neckseam will work forever throughout that playthrough and warpaint will be back to normal. 



[size=7][center] MY FEMALE COMPILATIONS[/size]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28712][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZRT3R.jpg[/IMG][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21576][img]http://i28.photobucket.com/albums/c249/AMUNET_CAMMEO/aelaeyes-1.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22382][img]http://i28.photobucket.com/albums/c249/AMUNET_CAMMEO/SERANAEYES-1.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://dragonage.nexusmods.com/mods/3883//?][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FAT86GG.jpg[/IMG][/url][/center]
author: Beans
